public class BundledJarRunnable
extends Object

Uses BundledJarRunnable to run a bundled jar.

initialize

public final void initialize(TwillContext context)
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Called when the container process starts. Executed in container machine. If any exception is thrown from this method, this runnable won't get retry.

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Called when the Runnable.run() completed. Useful for doing resource cleanup. This method would only get called if the call to TwillRunnable.initialize(TwillContext) was successful.

Specified by:
destroy in interface TwillRunnable
